name: Beanathon
description:
Made for Blackthornprod Game Jam with theme "Less is More"

Beanathon is a puzzle game about a bean collecting pots, where the less you jump, the higher you jump. You can use stuff like boxes and power-ups to solve puzzles. I was inspired by "Baba Is You" and "Boxboy".

Controls:

- Space to jump

- Arrows to move

- R to restart

Credits:

- Code and art done by me

- Music made by HeatleyBros 
https://www.audiomicro.com/artist/heatleybros

- Playtesting: Boniacz, 3sdeath, Asek, Tserrano, any_key13

- Special thanks to Ven for advice
